scripts.bundle: esbuild src/handler.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --outfile=dist/handler.mjs --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" && cd dist && zip -j lambda.zip handler.mjs
scripts.deploy: npm run bundle && cd infra && terraform apply
